Title: Beethoven: Overture Egmont -  Radio Filharmonisch Orkest led by Karina Canellakis - Live Concert HD
Description:
The Radio Philharmonic Orchestra led by conductor Karina Canellakis perform the 'Overture' from Beethoven's set of incidental music pieces 'Egmont, Op. 84' during the Sunday Morning Concert on the 1st of March 2020.

The music:
Ludwig van Beethoven - Overture 'Egmont, Op. 84'

Musicians:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Karina Canellakis [conductor]

Recording:
Sunday the 1st of March 2020, live in Het Concertgebouw in Amsterdam.

Title: Boulanger: Faust et Hélène - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis - Live concert HD
Description:
-- English below --

Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert opent het seizoen in grootse bezetting: koor, orkest, solisten en met chef-dirigent van het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest Karina Canellakis. Dit Openingsconcert weerspiegelt de kracht van het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert: oog voor de rijke muziektraditie, een fijn afgestelde antenne voor vergeten werken en genieën én bijdragend aan de uitbreiding en vernieuwing van het repertoire.

De jong overleden Lili Boulanger ontving in 1913 met de cantate Faust et Hélène als eerste vrouw de Prix de Rome. 

Het muzikale programma:
Lili Boulanger - Faust et Hélène, cantate voor mezzosopraan, tenor, bariton en orkest

De uitvoerenden:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Karina Canellakis, dirigent
Julie Boulianne, mezzosopraan
Julien Behr, tenor
Jean-Sébastien Bou, bariton 

Opname:
AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert op 16 september 2022 in TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht.

Kijk het hele concert op NPO Start:
https://www.npostart.nl/avrotros-vrijdagconcert-openingsconcert-seizoen-20222023/16-09-2022/WO_AT_20006051

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

—————————————

On the musical program:
Lili Boulanger - Faust et Hélène, cantata for mezzo-soprano, tenor, baritone and orchestra

The musicians:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Karina Canellakis, conductor
Julie Boulianne, mezzo-soprano
Julien Behr, tenor
Jean-Sébastien Bou, baritone

Recording: 
AVROTROS Friday Concerto, Friday the 16th of September 2022, in TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, The Netherlands.

Watch the full concert on NPO Start:
https://www.npostart.nl/avrotros-vrijdagconcert-openingsconcert-seizoen-20222023/16-09-2022/WO_AT_20006051

Title: Brahms: Tweede Serenade - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis - AVROTROS Klassiek HD
Description:
Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert is terug, en hoe! Voor het eerst sinds de coronacrisis vond het concert weer live plaats in de Grote Zaal in TivoliVredenburg. Leden van het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis speelden de 'Tweede Serenade voor orkest' van Johannes Brahms.

Op het programma:
Johannes Brahms - Tweede Serenade in A, op. 16

De uitvoerenden:
Leden van het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis

Opname:
Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert van vrijdag 19 juni 2020, in de Grote Zaal in TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht.

www.nporadio4.nl/avrotrosvrijdagconcert

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

---------------------------------------------------

For the first time since the corona crisis, a live performance of The AVROTROS Friday Concerto took place in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht. Members of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra, led by conductor Karina Canellakis, performed the 'Serenade No. 2' by Brahms.

On the musical program:
Johannes Brahms - Serenade No. 2 in A, Op. 16 

The musicians:
Members of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra
Karina Canellakis [conductor]

Recording:
The AVROTROS Friday Concerto of Friday the 19th of June 2020, in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht.

Title: De Graaff: Les Cymbales Sonores - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis - Live Concert
Description:
Het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest en Groot Omroepkoor bestaan 75 jaar! Om dit te vieren, openden het orkest en koor op vrijdag 11 september op feestelijke wijze het nieuwe seizoen van Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert. Ze speelden onder meer de wereldpremière van 'Les cymbales sonores' van componist Jan-Peter de Graaff.

Op het programma:
Jan-Peter de Graaff - Les cymbales sonores (wereldpremière)

De uitvoerenden:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest 
Groot Omroepkoor  
Karina Canellakis [dirigent]

Opname: Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert van vrijdag 11 september 2020, in de Grote Zaal van TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht.

https://www.nporadio4.nl/avrotrosvrijdagconcert

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

--------------------------------------------

The Radio Philharmonic Orchestra and The Netherlands Radio Choir are celebrating their 75th anniversary! The party took place during the opening of the brand new season of The AVROTROS Friday Concerto, a series by Dutch broadcaster AVROTROS. Among other works, they performed the world premiere of the piece 'Les cymbales sonores' by Dutch composer Jan-Peter de Graaff.

On the musical program:
Jan-Peter de Graaff - Les cymbales sonores (world premiere)

The musicians:
Radio Philharmonic Orchestra
The Netherlands Radio Choir
Karina Canellakis [conductor]

Recording: The AVROTROS Friday Concerto of Friday the 11th of September 2020, in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, The Netherlands.

Title: John Adams: Shaker Loops - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest & Karina Canellakis - The Crazy Project
Description:
➜ English description below! 

The Crazy Project: klassieke muziek zoals nooit tevoren. In deze unieke versie van Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert zie en hoor je klassieke muziek op een volledig nieuwe manier. Dicht op de huid, met een prachtig lichtplan en gefilmd als Hollywoodproductie. Op het muzikale programma staan twee bijzondere werken van Adams en Bartók.

Bekijk ook 'Blauwbaards burcht' van Bartók: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HuYH-0D5bpk

♫ Op het muzikale programma:
John Adams - Shaker Loops (versie 1982)

♫ De uitvoerenden:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Karina Canellakis [dirigent / artistic director]

♫ Opname:
Grote Zaal van TivoliVredenburg, Utrecht

Artistic director: Karina Canellakis
Regie: Henk van Engen
Muziekregie: Ron Ford
Productie: Ronald Kok, Manon Tuynman
Lichtontwerp: Henk-Jan van Beek / Light-H-Art
Lichtfaciliteiten: Ampco Flashlight
Flashlight: Roy Aarninkhof
Meercamera: NEP / Luc IJpelaar
TivoliVredenburg: Luc Wouters
Opnameleiding: Frank Baarda
Partituuradvies: Bas Wielenga
Programmeur AVROTROS: Astrid in 't Veld
Eindredacteur AVROTROS: Anja van Keulen
I.s.m. AVROTROS, Stichting Omroepmuziek en TivoliVredenburg

www.nporadio4.nl/avrotrosvrijdagconcert

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

------------------------------------------

The Crazy Project: classical music like you've never seen before. In this unique version of The AVROTROS Friday Concerto you see and hear classical music in a totally different and surprising way. Up close, with stunning lighting and filmed like a Hollywood production. The Radio Philharmonic Orchestra and Karina Canellakis perform two pieces by Adams and Bartók.

Also watch 'Bluebeard's Castle' by Béla Bartók: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=HuYH-0D5bpk

♫ On the musical program:
John Adams - Shaker Loops (version 1982)

♫ The musicians:
Radio Philharmonic Orchestra
Karina Canellakis [conductor / artistic director]

♫ Recording:
Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg, Utrecht, The Netherlands

Artistic director: Karina Canellakis
Director: Henk van Engen
Musical director: Ron Ford
Production: Ronald Kok, Manon Tuynman
Light design: Henk-Jan van Beek / Light-H-Art
Light facilities: Ampco Flashlight
Flashlight: Roy Aarninkhof
Camera's: NEP / Luc IJpelaar
TivoliVredenburg: Luc Wouters
Floor manager: Frank Baarda
Score advisor: Bas Wielenga
Programming AVROTROS: Astrid in 't Veld
Editor in chief AVROTROS: Anja van Keulen

♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Coriolan Overture (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the BBC Symphony Orchestra in this performance of Beethoven’s Coriolan Overture. It was recorded live on July 23, 2018 at BBC Prom 12.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Symphony No. 2 (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Danish National Symphony Orchestra in this fresh and superb performance of Ludwig Van Beethoven’s Symphony No. 2 in D Major. The concert was recorded live on February 8, 2018.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Symphony No. 3 in E♭ „Eroica“
Description: London Philharmonic

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Symphony No. 5 (2018)
Description:
American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Melbourne Symphony Orchestra in this performance of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 5 in C Minor. It was recorded live in concert on November 17, 2018.

More information about Ms. Canellakis can be found on her website here: http://karinacanellakis.com/

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Symphony No. 7 (2019)
Description:
American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Swedish Radio Symphony Orchestra in a performance of Beethoven’s Symphony No. 7. It was recorded live on April 10, 2019.

More info about Ms. Canellakis can be found here: http://karinacanellakis.com/

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven - Symphony No. 8 (2017)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Milwaukee Symphony Orchestra in a fine performance of Ludwig Van Beethoven’s Symphony No. 8 in F Major. The concert was recorded live from performances in March 2017.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Beethoven: Symphony No. 7 (2017)
Description: American conductor and violinist Karina Canellakis conducts the Rundfunk-Sinfonieorchester Berlin in a fresh performance Beethoven's Symphony No. 7. It was recorded live on September 2, 2017.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Brahms and Strauss
Description:
Brahms: Symphonie n°4 
Strauss: les Quatre derniers lieder 

Camilla Nylund, soprano
Orchestre National de France

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Britten - Four Sea Interludes (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Netherlands Radio Philharmonic Orchestra in this performance of Benjamin Britten's Four Sea Interludes from the opera ‘Peter Grimes'. The concert was recorded live on March 18, 2018.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Britten - Sinfonia da Requiem (2019)
Description:
American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Swedish Radio Symphony Orchestra in a performance of Britten's Sinfonia da Requiem. It was recorded live on April 10, 2019.

More info about Ms. Canellakis can be found here: http://karinacanellakis.com/

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Debussy - La Mer (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads The Phoenix Symphony in this evocative performance of Debussy’s La Mer. It was recorded live from concerts in January 2018.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Janáček - Glagolitic Mass (2019)
Description:
American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the BBC Symphony Orchestra in a performance of Janáček’s Glagolitic Mass. Soloists were Asmik Grigorian (S), Jennifer Johnston (MS), Ladislav Elgr (T), Jan Martiník (B) and Peter Holder (Org) along with the BBC Singers and BBC Symphony Chorus. It was recorded live on July 19, 2019.

More info about Ms. Canellakis can be found here: http://karinacanellakis.com/

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Rachmaninoff - Symphonic Dances (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the BBC Symphony Orchestra in this performance of Rachmaninoff’s Symphonic Dances. It was recorded live on July 23, 2018 at BBC Prom 12.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Shostakovich - Symphony No. 8 (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the West Australian Symphony Orchestra in this performance of Shostakovich's Symphony No. 8 in C Minor. It was recorded live in concert on November 24, 2018.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Stravinsky - Firebird Suite, 1945 Version (2018)
Description: American conductor Karina Canellakis leads the Adelaide Symphony Orchestra in this performance of the 1945 version of Stravinsky’s Firebird Suite. It was recorded live on November 2, 2018.

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Stravinsky, Moessorgski, Unsuk Chin and Aanvang
Description:
Aanvang concert
Modest Moessorgski - Dageraad op de rivier Moskva uit Chovansjtsjina
Unsuk Chin - Pianoconcert
Igor Stravinsky - Le sacre du printemps / The Rite of Spring

Radio Filharmonisch Orkest

Title: Karina Canellakis conducts Tchaikovsky: Symphony No. 4 (2016)
Description: American conductor and violinist Karina Canellakis conducts the Danish National Symphony Orchestra in an outstanding performance of Tchaikovsky's Symphony No. 4 in F Minor. It was recorded live on February 18, 2016.

Bartók: Divertimento

Violinist: Sergey Khachatryan

Title: LIVE: Radio Filharmonisch Orkest, Karina Canellakis & Simone Lamsma - BankGiro Loterij ZomerSessies
Description:
Het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest met chef-dirigente Karina Canellakis in de BankGiro Loterij ZomerSessies!  Met werken van George Walker en William Grant Still, en de Amerikaanse suite van Dvořák. Uit de 'oude wereld' hoort je de wervelende Tzigane van Ravel, in handen van stervioliste Simone Lamsma.

Programma:
00:32 - Still - Aspiration: Lento, con risoluzione (uit 'Symfonie nr. 1' 'Afro-American')
11:37 - Tsjaikovski - Mélodie in Es (uit 'Souvenir d'un lieu cher', op. 42) (arr. A. Lascae)
16:58 - Ravel - Tzigane, rapsodie de concert
31:09 - Walker - Lyric for strings
38:13 - Dvořák - Suite in A, op. 98 'American'

Steun het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest & Het Concertgebouw en doneer voor dit concert: https://bit.ly/2ZfdLkl

www.concertgebouw.nl/zomersessies

Title: Sibelius: Symfonie nr. 3 - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis - Live Concert HD
Description:
Het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest en Groot Omroepkoor bestaan 75 jaar! Om dit te vieren, openden het orkest en koor op vrijdag 11 september op feestelijke wijze het nieuwe seizoen van Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert. Ze speelden onder meer de 'Symfonie nr. 3' van Jean Sibelius.

Op het programma:
Jean Sibelius - Symfonie nr. 3, op.52 in C gr.t.

De uitvoerenden:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest 
Groot Omroepkoor  
Karina Canellakis [dirigent]

Opname: Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert van vrijdag 11 september 2020, in de Grote Zaal van TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht.

https://www.nporadio4.nl/avrotrosvrijdagconcert

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

--------------------------------------------

The Radio Philharmonic Orchestra and The Netherlands Radio Choir are celebrating their 75th anniversary! The party took place during the opening of the brand new season of The AVROTROS Friday Concerto, a series by Dutch broadcaster AVROTROS. Among other works, they performed the 'Symphony No. 3' by Jean Sibelius.

On the musical program:
Jean Sibelius - Symphony No. 3 in C major, Op. 52

The musicians:
Radio Philharmonic Orchestra
The Netherlands Radio Choir
Karina Canellakis [conductor]

Recording: The AVROTROS Friday Concerto of Friday the 11th of September 2020, in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, The Netherlands.

Title: Tsoupaki: Aurora (World Premiere) - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest & Groot Omroepkoor - Live concert HD
Description:
-- English below --

Het muzikale programma:
Calliope Tsoupaki - Aurora (wereldpremière;  opdrachtwerk AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert)

De uitvoerenden:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Groot Omroepkoor
Karina Canellakis, dirigent

Opname:
AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert op 15 september 2023 in TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht..

Kijk het hele concert op NPO Start:
https://www.npostart.nl/avrotros-vrijdagconcert-openingsconcert-2023-calliope-tsoupaki-rachmaninov-en-sibelius/15-09-2023/WO_AT_20078183

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

—————————————

On the musical programme:
Calliope Tsoupaki - Aurora (world premiere)

Tsoupaki: There is no story in AURORA. Only names, the names of boats rescuing refugees in the Mediterranean and the names of stars and constellations as an allegory for darkness and the night sky.

“Maybe we would have made it to heaven” is a sentence of a surviver of the deadly journey, that I read in an article on rescuing refugees in the Mediterranean sea.

When I was asked to reflect on the thematic association of “Wanderlust” to this composition, opening the AVROTROS Friday concert season 2023-2024, I could only think of the other face of a journey, I could only think of the night in the sea, of dreaming a new life, of dying for it.

“Wanderlust”:  the urge to leave, to roam, the desire to move letting go of here and now, traveling, seeking a fantasy, an unknown world, taking off to a new other life …

The musicians:
Radio Filharmonisch Orkest
Groot Omroepkoor
Karina Canellakis, conductor

Recording: 
AVROTROS Friday Concerto, Friday the 15th of September 2023, in TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht, The Netherlands.

Watch the full concert on NPO Start:
https://www.npostart.nl/avrotros-vrijdagconcert-openingsconcert-2023-calliope-tsoupaki-rachmaninov-en-sibelius/15-09-2023/WO_AT_20078183

Title: Verdi: Strijkkwartet - Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis - AVROTROS Klassiek HD
Description:
Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert is terug, en hoe! Voor het eerst sinds de coronacrisis vond het concert weer live plaats in de Grote Zaal in TivoliVredenburg. Leden van het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis speelden een arrangement voor strijkorkest van Verdi's 'Strijkkwartet'.

Op het programma:
Giuseppe Verdi - Strijkkwartet in e-mineur (arr. voor strijkorkest)

De uitvoerenden:
Leden van het Radio Filharmonisch Orkest o.l.v. Karina Canellakis

Opname:
Het AVROTROS Vrijdagconcert van vrijdag 19 juni 2020, in de Grote Zaal in TivoliVredenburg te Utrecht.

www.nporadio4.nl/avrotrosvrijdagconcert

Meer AVROTROS Klassiek:
♬ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/AVROTROS.Klassiek/
♬ Twitter: https://twitter.com/klassiekonline
♬ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/avrotrosklassiek/

---------------------------------------------------

For the first time since the corona crisis, a live performance of The AVROTROS Friday Concerto took place in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht. Members of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra, led by conductor Karina Canellakis, performed an arrangement for strings of Verdi's 'String Quartet'.

On the musical program:
Giuseppe Verdi - String Quartet in e minor

The musicians:
Members of the Radio Philharmonic Orchestra
Karina Canellakis [conductor]

Recording:
The AVROTROS Friday Concerto of Friday the 19th of June 2020, in the Great Hall of TivoliVredenburg in Utrecht.
